title: Which investment programs would you like greater access to through Catalyst Bridge?
body:
Our influential Catalyst Bridge Program is a vital aspect that helps get us closer to our overall vision of “DeFi for all”. It is a tool that permits keyTango users to invest in lucrative cross chain investment programs with exceptional ease of usage. We ensure that ease by simplifying the UX for our users and substantially reducing the gas fees through aggregation. 
 
A crucial step forward involves connecting the Catalyst bridge program with other promising projects on L2 networks that ensure the development of investor-friendly programs that provide our users with diverse investment programs. 

What we are asking you to do is help us decide, through our governance tokens, which investment programs would you like greater access to through Catalyst Bridge. Investment programs that are native to: 
 
1. Bridge to another Binance Smart Chain (BSC)
2. Bridge to Polygon (Matic)
3. Bridge to another COSMOS program
 
As already emphasized above, we desire to stick true to our principle of being the easiest gateway to the DeFi space. This is where we need our community to help us make this important decision.
author: 0x63b350664686F8Ef9749b28DFB896A23007B3Ea2
